root.name: Carmageddon Splat Pack
root.description: Carmageddon: Splat Pack is an expansion to Carmageddon (for PC only), released in 1997. You can still choose between 'Max Damage' or 'Die Anna' Features: - 20 New Tracks - 15 New Vehicles - 9 New Environments (Such as a Jail, Mayan Temples, even Hell itself) - Network Levels - 3Dfx support The Player's car also went through some minor cosmetic changes for no reasons described in-game.
